item.title: Pkp on death
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Heres my applydead you can modify it.

           [code]/**
 * Dieing
 **/

  public void applyDead() {
	c.respawnTimer = 10;
	c.isDead = false;
	if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
		// c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
		c.killerId = findKiller();
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if (o != null) {
			if (!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false) {
			}
			if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
				o.sendMessage("You have defeated "
						+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + "!");
			if (c.playerLevel[23] < 98 || c.inWild()) {
				o.pkPoints += 1;
				o.getPA().addSkillXP(25000, 23);
				o.sendMessage("You have less than 99 pking so you recieve 1 point!");
			} else {
				o.pkPoints += 3;
				o.sendMessage("You have 99 pking so you recieve 3 points!");
			}
			c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
			if (o.duelStatus == 5) {
				o.duelStatus++;
			}
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Pkp on death
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

when a player dies in the wildy he receives 1 pkp, im using hybrid pvp v3 heres code for it

[code=actionscript]}


public void applyDead() {    
    c.respawnTimer = 10;
    c.isDead = false;
    if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
        //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
        c.killerId = findKiller();
        Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
        if(o != null) {
            if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
            }
            if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
                o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!");
                            if(c.inWild()){
                                    o.pkPoints += 1;
                                    o.sendMessage("You have received 1 Pk Points");
                            }[/code]
